RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 1 400 Y Dirt CR: 76. Maiden Purse 22800. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIL NEWT dueled, drew off, best. BIG POSIES CARTEL steady bid, no match. JM MIA in contention, hung. ONE FAMOOSE EAGLE broke out. TRUMP ME AGAIN vied early, faltered. BIGG WOOD DEE veered in start. PICK POCKET PERRY crowded start, off slow. MJS MOONFIRE fell, vanned off.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 2 400 Y Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 33000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RELENTLESS CORONADO came in start, drew clear, held. FLYN ELECTRIC COWBOY broke in, bumped, off slow, closed with a rush, gaining. SKINDATSMOKEWAGON chased, couldn't gain. ALLTIMEFAV broke out, bumped. WYN OR LEWS broke out, bumped. JESSIES HERO evenly, no menace. MY FIRST PRIZE REX bumped, squeezed start, off slow. RED LETTR REVELATION no threat. The rider of FLYN ELECTRIC COWBOY claimed foul against the rider of RELENTLESS CORONADO for alleged interference at the start. No change was made.

ENTRY.NAME: Red Lettr Revelation
ENTRY.OWNER: Ford Richard E and Sorenson Fred

ENTRY.NAME: My First Prize Rex
ENTRY.OWNER: Rancho El 48 LLC and Ruthardt Kenneth

ENTRY.NAME: Flyn Electric Cowboy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bumped, off slow, closed with a rush, gaining

ENTRY.NAME: Relentless Coronado
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in start, drew clear, held

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 3 350 Y Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Purse 41400. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WOODYS STORM bumped after start, held. ELISAS ESPERANCE fractious gate, broke in, steady close. GET DOWN DRAGON close throughout. LITTLE SCARY CHIC off a step slowly, steady close. TOURAINE clean trip. JUST DE VINE bumped after start, vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Little Scary Chic
ENTRY.COMMENT: off a step slowly, steady close

ENTRY.NAME: Elisas Esperance
ENTRY.OWNER: Bolen Bradley C Clinger Cole M and Rodriguez Jose H
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, broke in, steady close

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Special Weight Purse 22800. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NOT TO FANCY bumped and was squeezed at the start, pressed the pace, challenged four across on the turn, fell back, continued willingly, wore down HOLY BULLET to get up in the final strides and held off the late charge of COMFORT J BYRD. COMFORT J BYRD bumped at the start, was never far back while racing outside, went six wide entering the stretch, found his best stride late and was gaining ground. HOLY BULLET moved up to set a pressured pace, inched away on the turn, led to the final strides and lost position late. TAZ MARKING pressed the pace, challenged between horses on the turn, fell back and continued willingly to the wire. HEZEKIAH'S RULE pressed the pace, challenged three wide between horses on the turn, fell back and finished evenly. LEIGHTON'S DREAM broke out and bumped at the start, flashed speed, dropped back and went evenly thereafter. PHANTOM RAIN raced close to the pace along the rail while racing in hand, backed up on the turn and gave way. I'M A DREAMER TOO vied early, gave way into the turn and was not a threat. FEARLESS YODA was off slowly, showed little, distanced the field and walked off. WILD DISTRACTION was void of early speed, bolted, was eased and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Phantom Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace rail, raced in hand, backed up turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Taz Marking
ENTRY.COMMENT: challenged between horses turn, fell back, willingly to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Hezekiah's Rule
ENTRY.COMMENT: challenged 3wide between horses turn, fell back, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Bullet
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, inched away turn, led to final strides

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Distraction
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, bolted, eased, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: I'm a Dreamer Too
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early, gave way into turn, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Leighton's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped, flashed speed, fell back, evenly thereafter

ENTRY.NAME: Not to Fancy
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, squeezed start, challenged 4across turn, up late, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Comfort J Byrd
ENTRY.OWNER: Duncan BW Duncan Joe Duncan Valerie and Zamora Chris
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, raced outside, 6w bid, best stride late, gaining

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 5 400 Y Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 33000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE SPARKS INTEREST held well, driving. FLASH OF GOLD chased, couldn't gain. ARLIE broke in, close throughout. MY SWEET JESS clean trip. ROLL ON CANDY LIGHTS in close, no rally. POLITISEIS mid pack, evenly. JESS A GOOD CANDYMAN no mishap. BUCKO broke awkwardly, crowded, drifted in. A BLAZIN SPIRIT slow early, shut off, steadied.

ENTRY.NAME: Arlie
ENTRY.OWNER: Grant Cox Revocable Trust Cox Rex and Ruby Doug

ENTRY.NAME: Roll On Candy Lights
ENTRY.OWNER: Barr Stacy and Addison Carol A

RACE.RACE_TEXT: All American Overflow Final RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 6 440 Y Dirt CR: 90. Final Purse 75000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS. Weight, 124 lbs. $250 TO ENTER, $250 TO START. HORSES THAT RAN IN THE AA TRIALS AND DID NOT QUALIFY FOR THE FUTURITY OR JUVENILE. FASTEST NON QUALIFIER TIMES FROM EACH DAY PREFERRED.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WALK IT BACK in time, all out. CANT PASS THIS ONE broke in, drifted, dueled, game. TOP COWBOY broke in, close throughout, good effort. BELIEVE IN PERRY broke out, bumped. I AM CANDY came in start, steady bid. MOON SPOT clean trip. MITEY RELENTLESS no mishap. HESA GAMER bumped start, crowded.

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Spot
ENTRY.OWNER: Lee Johnny Lee Ezra Elton Lee Isaiah Laird Jim Crenwelge Curtis and Giles Jill B

ENTRY.NAME: Believe in Perry
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Henry E and Brown Mimi

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Top Cowboy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, close throughout, good effort

ENTRY.NAME: Walk It Back
ENTRY.OWNER: Howlet Heysol Medina Jose Saul and Moreno Victor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Overnight S. RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 91. Stakes Purse 75000. PURSE $75,000 (INCLUDES $4,000 FROM NMHBA OVERNIGHT FUND) $250 TO ENTER, $250 TO START. No refunds if you fail to start for any reason. Preferred by money earned in 2022-2023.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CORRINA CORRINA moved up along the backstretch to press the pace three across, fell back on the turn, went five wide entering the stretch, bid willingly to duel and inched away late to prove best. BELLA DONA vied inside, drew clear briefly on the turn, responded to duel and was outfinished in a game effort. DELIA raced close to the pace along the inside, angled out for the drive, went seven wide at the top of the stretch and finished well to earn show. TIGHT FITTIN JEANS bumped while getting away well, led early, vied to the turn and gave way. BYE BYE BRANDI trailed the field while never far back, raced outside to the turn, dropped in and lacked a stretch response.

ENTRY.NAME: Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace inside, angled out for drive, 7w bid, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Bella Dona
ENTRY.OWNER: Driggers Robert M Driggers Del Rae and Ivey Ben Lee
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, drew clear briefly turn, responded to duel, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Corrina Corrina
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, fell back turn, 5wide bid, dueled, inched away late

ENTRY.NAME: Bye Bye Brandi
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed outside, dropped in turn, no stretch response

ENTRY.NAME: Tight Fittin Jeans
ENTRY.OWNER: Green Greg Green Delinda M and O'Connor Corie
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped while away well, led early, vied to turn, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: All American Juvenile S. RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 8 440 Y Dirt CR: 97. Stakes Purse 200000. FOR 2 YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE QUALIFIED FOR THE 2023 ALL AMERICAN QUARTER HORSE JUVENILE. Weight 124 lbs. Five fastest non-qualifiers from each day of the trials will qualify for the juvenile. $500 to enter with an additional $500 to start fee. There wil l be two also eligibles drawn for this race, one non-qualifier from each day of trials. Preference will be by time. You must start in this race to be eligible for any part of the purse. (If you fail to start for any reason, fees will be forfeited.) Al so eligibles will not be charged an entry fee unless they draw into the race. (Will run a ten horse gate.) Scratch time is Sunday Sept. 3 by 8:30 A.M.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VISA came out after start, drew clear. A POLITICAL CLUSTER broke in, steady bid. LETHALCARTELFAVORITE clean trip. KJ FLYING COWGIRL veered in start. SIX FAMOUS EAGLES clean trip. SANDY ROSE broke awkwardly. SHOELESS fractious gate, broke in. IRISH SEIS bumped, pinched back start. KJ LITTLE DUCE COUP hesitated, bumped, squeezed. BP DOWN FOR A CORONA broke in, bumped, lost path. The stewards' posted an inquiry concerning the start. No change was made.

ENTRY.NAME: Kj Flying Cowgirl
ENTRY.OWNER: Lee John Lee Kathy and Mares I Ruben

ENTRY.NAME: Visa
ENTRY.OWNER: Simmons Racing Wootan Racing and Beasley Roger K
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out after start, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Kj Little Duce Coup
ENTRY.OWNER: Lee John Lee Kathy and Mares I Ruben

ENTRY.NAME: Lethalcartelfavorite
ENTRY.OWNER: La Feliz Montana Ranch LLC and Hubbard Shaun

RACE.RACE_TEXT: All American Gold Cup S. - Grade1 RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 9 440 Y Dirt CR: 104. Stakes Purse 250000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weights: Three year olds 126 lbs.; Older 128 lbs. Nominations close Thursday, August 24, 2023 at 12:00 NOON. $500 to nominate (non refundable). Supplemental nomination fee of $7,500 due at time of entry (Includes all fees.) $5,000 to enter. Preferred by money earned in 2022-2023. If you fail to start for any reason, fees will be forfeited.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KJ DESPARADO broke in, drifted in late, held. FLASH BAK clean trip, up wire for place. BOMB CYCLONE came in start, vied throughout, outnodded for 2nd. LETHAL AVENGER broke in, crowded late, lost path. A TRES OF EAGLE pushed in start, in tight rail. GOOD REASON CARTEL broke in, outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: pushed in start, in tight rail

ENTRY.OWNER: Lee John Lee Wanda Kathy and Mares I Ruben

RACE.RACE_TEXT: All American Futurity - Grade1 RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 10 440 Y Dirt CR: 116. Futurity Purse 3000000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE QUALIFIED FOR THE FINALS OF THE 2023 ALL AMERICAN QUARTER HORSE FUTURITY. (Five fastest times from each day qualify for the finals) (No Also Eligible List) Weight 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COWBOYS GUN Z pushed out start, held on gamely. TRANE STATION V pushed out start, chased, couldn't gain. DARK NME ducked in start. FLYIN RABBIT 123 vied throughout, game. DASHING TRES broke awkwardly, bumped. CORNER POCKET 123 broke in, bumped. AJ PRECIOUS JEWEL bobbled start. DEVASTATING came out start. CUZ LIGHTYEAR stumbled start.

ENTRY.NAME: Cowboys Gun Z
ENTRY.COMMENT: pushed out start, held on gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Trane Station V
ENTRY.COMMENT: pushed out start, chased, couldn't gain

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Overnight S. RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 11 7 1/2F Dirt CR: 103. Stakes Purse 75000. $250 TO ENTER, $250 TO START. No refunds of you fail to start for any reason. Preferred by money earned in 2022-2023.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHERIFF BROWN was unhurried early, saved ground, rallied into the second turn, shifted out, closed willingly, assumed command in the upper stretch and drew off under mild urging. CLAVICHORD went four wide into the first turn, vied to the upper stretch, fell back and was no match for the winner. RAISEBEFORETHEFLOP was crowded between horses into the first turn, dropped back, rallied on the second turn and offered a mild bid to be along for show. GREY STORM got away well, set a pressured pace to the upper stretch, tired and stopped. THE RIGHT STUFF (GB) vied between horses early, was taken back to stalk to the second turn, tired and stopped. GODDARD trailed the field, was eased and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Grey Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, set pressured pace to upper stretch, tired, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Sheriff Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried inside, rallied 2nd turn, took over upper, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: The Right Stuff (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between horses, taken back to stalk, tired turn, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Raisebeforetheflop
ENTRY.OWNER: 5 Star Racing LLC and Valdez Melaquias
ENTRY.COMMENT: crowded between into 1st turn, rallied 2nd turn, along for show

ENTRY.NAME: Clavichord
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4wide into 1st turn, vied to upper stretch, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 12 350 Y Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 33000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIL MISS EMMA clear early, best. MISS FDD clear path, chased. FLASH AND DASH clean trip, no rally. WICKED REASON no mishap. CHEERS CORONA ducked in start. QUITE FLASHY mid pack, evenly. EZZE OFF no threat. MOREVERSIONS outrun. TWIGGYS FAVORITE hesitated start, came in, not urged.

ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated start, came in, not urged

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Reason
ENTRY.OWNER: Stokes Cheryl and Super Champion Inc
